title: Pinging The Map Problem
body: Whenever I press G and click on the map instead of pinging it brings my camera to the spot that I clicked. Does anyone know why this is and how to fix it?

replies.body:
It might be happening if your keybinds were changed accidentally somehow. Let's try a quick config reset to set all of those hotkeys back to their defaults.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
